column1: Local Foods////I love this place! Definitely one of my favorite spots for lunch. It's laid back and fast
column3: delicious food. I personally love the crab and shrimp sandwich
column4: as well as the truffled egg sandwich. UNBELIEVABLE. I was so excited about their sides because I love healthy antioxidant-protein-whole grain-packed food
column5: but the mixtures of the sides seem to be a little off and have strange taste to them. I almost wish it was just a simple kale or beet salad... but they aren't bad by any means
column6: just not my taste. If you're in the mood for something sweet
column7: their carrot cupcakes are unreal. I'm not a big cupcake person but these are seriously to die for!
